name: com.perell.artemis
description: Narrative programming package that accesses rules and world-state data to give the most appropriate and important delivery. May your aim be true.

samples.description: Contains the necessary starting data to get the program to compile.
Contains sample code for a simple debug logger using the Artemis system.
Contains sample code for Ink assets compiling to coincide with Artemis arrows.
Contains sample code for Yarn Project starting nodes to coincide with Artemis arrows.
